system.description: The shadiest of all the classes, Assassins see life as expendable and unimportant. Even their own life is trivial, someone will kill them sooner or later. That's life. Life is short and thus Assassins tend to get to the point quickly, literally. Some-what of a martial artist, there is something Zen about the Assassin's way, not unlike the @L[Class:Duelist]{Duelist} in that they have strong inner motivation, though care nothing for honor. Assassins try to increase hatred between people in the hopes of creating more job opportunities for themselves. If you're an Assassin, don't think twice about killing someone, care little for your own life and cut to the chase!

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @L[Ability:Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.
You prepare a 5 foot by 5 foot area. While in this area, you may make a limited improved @L[Ability:Hide]{Hide} action.

You become @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak} ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, @L[Core:Cover]{three-quarters cover}, or some other feature which the @L[Core:GM]{GM} determines is appropriate for being @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}.
system.limitation: You may only Hide in the location you have prepared and you do not get the attribute improvement from this ability. You also do not remain @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden} if you leave this location.

overview.base: Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.

overview.proficient: You instead climb at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{normal speed}.

overview.base: You vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{quarter speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed}.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.
